segments.text: I think Yoga might be suitable for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because it doesn't require a lot of energy and thus easy to keep up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I see people sweat a lot doing Yoga too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I just need to try it once . I'm in urgent need of some exercise to lose some weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should try swimming then . It helps you to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S2
